languagePacks.title: Language Packs
languagePacks.uploadDescription: Upload a .tar.xz, .tar.gz, or .xz language pack archive

delete.title: Delete Language Pack
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the language pack "{{ name }}" ({{ locale }})? This action cannot be undone.

systemPrompts.title: Use System Prompts
systemPrompts.description: Use native OS dialogs for confirmations.

devMode.title: Developer Mode
devMode.description: Enable debug console and verbose logging.

redactValues.title: Redact Private Values
redactValues.description: Hide the values of sensitive variables.

privateFiles.title: Private Files
privateFiles.description: Configure which files are considered private.

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Customize the application branding with your own logo and favicon (root only).

appName.title: Application Name
appName.description: Custom name displayed in the header and browser tab.
appName.hint: Maximum 32 characters. Leave empty to use the default name.

logo.title: Logo
logo.description: Upload a logo to display in the application header.
logo.formats: Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, WebP, SVG

delete.title: Delete Logo
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the logo? The default placeholder will be shown instead.

favicon.title: Favicon
favicon.description: Upload a favicon to display in browser tabs.

delete.title: Delete Favicon
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the favicon? The default browser icon will be shown instead.

resetDatabase.title: Reset Database
resetDatabase.description: Reset the database to its default state. This will delete all user data.

port.label: Port
port.description: Port for the server to listen on

tlsCertPath.label: TLS Certificate Path
tlsCertPath.description: Path to TLS certificate file (PEM format)

tlsKeyPath.label: TLS Key Path
tlsKeyPath.description: Path to TLS private key file (PEM format)

path.label: Persist Path
path.description: Path to save database on shutdown

cacheDuration.label: Cache Duration (minutes)
cacheDuration.description: Minimum time between automatic version syncs for a source (0 to disable caching)

workspace.label: Workspace Directory
workspace.description: Base directory for build workspaces (supports ~ for home directory)

download.label: Downloads
download.description: Download cache, proxy, and bandwidth settings

cacheMaxSize.label: Cache Max Size (GB)
cacheMaxSize.description: Maximum cache size in GB (0 = unlimited)

proxyUrl.label: Proxy URL
proxyUrl.description: HTTP(S) proxy URL for all downloads

localMirrorPath.label: Local Mirror Path
localMirrorPath.description: Local directory path for offline mirror

throttlePerWorker.label: Per-Worker Bandwidth (MB/s)
throttlePerWorker.description: Per-worker bandwidth limit in MB/s (0 = unlimited)

throttleGlobal.label: Global Bandwidth (MB/s)
throttleGlobal.description: Global bandwidth limit in MB/s across all workers (0 = unlimited)

security.label: Security
security.description: Rate limiting, token management, and encryption settings

rateLimitAuthPerMin.label: Auth Requests Per Minute
rateLimitAuthPerMin.description: Max auth requests (login/register/refresh) per minute per IP

rateLimitApiPerMin.label: API Requests Per Minute
rateLimitApiPerMin.description: Max API requests per minute per user/IP

rateLimitTrustProxy.label: Trust Proxy Headers
rateLimitTrustProxy.description: Trust X-Forwarded-For header for client IP detection

maxRefreshTokens.label: Max Refresh Tokens Per User
maxRefreshTokens.description: Maximum active refresh tokens per user

masterKeyPath.label: Master Key Path
masterKeyPath.description: Path to master encryption key file (auto-generated if missing)

settings.title: Server Settings
settings.description: Configure server runtime settings (requires root access)

defaultSources.title: Default Sources
defaultSources.description: Manage system-wide default upstream sources available to all users

deleteSource.title: Delete Default Source
deleteSource.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the default source "{{ name }}"? This action cannot be undone and will affect all users.

reset.title: Reset Database
reset.description: Reset the database to its default state. This will delete all user data, distributions, and custom configurations.

modal.title: Reset Database to Defaults
modal.description: All user accounts, distributions, custom components, sources, and settings will be permanently deleted. The database will be restored to its initial state with default system components and roles.
modal.confirmHint: This confirmation is required to prevent accidental data loss.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all data.
